pageTitle: Gregg Harper (R-MS) | Influence Explorer: Campaign Finance and Earmarks
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {10419=Gregory "Gregg" Harper (born June 1, 1956) is the U.S. Representative for Mississippi's 3rd congressional district, serving since 2009. He is a member of the Republican Party. The district includes the wealthier portions of the state capital, Jackson, along with most of that city's suburbs. Other cities in the district include Meridian and Natchez.}
textBeforeTable: Top Earmarks In State vs. Out of State in dollars For more information, see our Earmark Methodology page. Figures are based on both committee earmark disclosures and on analysis of appropriations bill text. Table shows top 10 earmarks, ordered by dollar amount in the final version of the bill. Earmarks from the president's budget proposal are not included.
